description: Try our easy to follow Pear & Choc Self-saucing Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pear & Choc Self-saucing Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 ripe pears, peeled, cored and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the pear slices in the bottom of a greased 1.5 litre ovenproof dish.

Sift the flour, cocoa powder and baking powder together into a large bowl and add the caster sugar, milk, melted butter and egg. Beat with a hand-held electric whisk until smooth and creamy, then pour over the pears.
Combine all the sauce ingredients in a saucepan and heat over a low heat, stirring, until the sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil, then pour over the pudding.
Bake in a preheated oven, 180°C for 35-40 minutes until the sponge is risen. Leave to stand for 3-4 minutes before serving. Serve with custard or vanilla ice cream.
